select seq_post_no.nextval from dual
insert into post (POST_NO, POST_BRD, POST_MEM, POST_TTL, POST_CNTNT, POST_DATE, POST_STAR, POST_EXST, POST_GU, POST_DONG, POST_ZIP, POST_RD) values (#{post_no}, #{post_brd}, #{post_mem}, #{post_ttl}, #{post_cntnt}, sysdate, #{post_star}, 'N', #{post_gu}, #{post_dong}, #{post_zip}, #{post_rd})
mapper.select: select NVL(A.DL_PRICE,0) DL_PRICE , NVL(A.DL_DEPOS,0) DL_DEPOS , NVL(A.DL_RNT,0) DL_RNT , B.DL_CONT_YM2 DL_CONT_YM from (select round(avg(DL_PRICE), 1) as dl_price , round(avg(DL_DEPOS), 1) as dl_depos , round(avg(DL_RNT), 1) as dl_rnt, DL_CONT_YM from deal where dl_gu = #{dl_gu} and dl_dong= #{dl_dong} and dl_zip=#{dl_zip} and dl_rd=#{dl_rd} and dl_ty = #{dl_ty} and dl_excv_area = #{dl_excv_area} GROUP BY DL_EXCV_AREA, DL_TY, DL_CONT_YM, DL_GU, DL_DONG, DL_ZIP, DL_RD order by dl_cont_ym desc) a, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(200801, 'yyyyMM'), level -1),'YYYYMM') as dl_cont_ym2 from dual connect by level < 132) b where a.dl_cont_ym(+) = b.dl_cont_ym2 ORDER BY B.dl_cont_ym2
mapper.insert: insert into reply (rpl_no, rpl_cntnt, rpl_date, rpl_exst, rpl_post, rpl_mem) values (seq_rpl_no.nextval, #{rpl_cntnt}, sysdate, 'N', #{rpl_post}, #{rpl_mem})
mapper.select: select rpl_no, rpl_cntnt, to_char(rpl_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as rlp_date, rpl_exst, rpl_post, rpl_mem, mem_email from (select * from post where post_no = #{int}), reply b, member where post_no = rpl_post and rpl_mem = mem_no
mapper.insert: insert into picture (pic_no, pic_file_nm, pic_file_path, pic_uuid, pic_post) values (seq_pic_no.nextval, #{pic_file_nm}, #{pic_file_path}, #{pic_uuid}, #{pic_post})
mapper.select: select round(((select round(avg(mkd_price)) from market, market_detail where mk_nm = mkd_mk and mk_dong = mkd_mk_dong and mkd_price <> 0) - (select round(avg(mkd_price), 1) from market, market_detail where mk_nm = mkd_mk and mk_dong = mkd_mk_dong and mk_dong like #{string} || '%' and mkd_price <> 0)) / 100, 0) as price from dual

select round(((select round(avg(hm_num), 0) from (select substr(hs_dong,1,2) as hs_dong, hs_date,sum(hs_hm_no) as hm_num from HUMAN_STATISTIC where hs_date = '201806' group by substr(hs_dong,1,2), hs_date)) - (select sum(HS_HM_NO) from HUMAN_STATISTIC where hs_dong like #{String} || '%' and hs_date = '201806')) / 5000, 1) as humanavg from dual
mapper.insert: insert into favorite (favor_no, favor_mem, favor_gu, favor_dong, favor_zip, favor_rd, favor_ty) values (seq_favor_no.nextval, #{favor_mem}, #{favor_gu}, #{favor_dong} , #{favor_zip}, #{favor_rd}, #{favor_ty})
